latestAction.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote. (consideration: CR S1359; text: CR S1358)

title: A resolution designating the week of February 24 through February 28, 2025, as "Public Schools Week".
ai_summary: A resolution designates the week of February 24 through February 28, 2025, as "Public Schools Week" A resolution designating the week from February 24 to February 28 as " public school week" Aresolution designating February 24-28, 2025 as "public school week".
